run_log.result: Soul Check v5.0.0 deployed and verified. POST /api/soul authenticates with cryptographic token. 10 endpoints gated. Sovereignty page updated to use real backend authentication.
run_log.learning: Soul Check gate works: real /api/soul endpoint + X-Soul-Token header + 24h TTL tokens. Sovereignty page is now a living window, not a brochure.
